Html:
Hi,

I just started to experiment with the GMAP library, and have a question about a marker on an overlay.

When I use for example Google Map as a map provider, it works as expected, but when I change to "EmptyProvider", the markers seem to dissappear from a certain "invisible border" within the control. The control which I dragged on to my form is called simply "gmap".
So the marker will show correctly, but if I drag (holding the right mouse button), it will dissappear at some point.

Any idea would be very welcome!
Imports GMap.NET
Imports GMap.NET.MapProviders
Imports GMap.NET.WindowsForms

gmap.MapProvider = GMapProviders.EmptyProvider
gmap.MinZoom = 1
gmap.MaxZoom = 17
gmap.Zoom = 1
gmap.SetCurrentPositionByKeywords("Lint, Belgium")

Dim markerone As New GMap.NET.WindowsForms.Markers.GMapMarkerGoogleGreen(New PointLatLng(51, 4))

markersoverlay.Markers.Add(markerone)
gmap.Overlays.Add(markersoverlay)
thanks a lot!
